## Source: ossf-package-analysis (661d762aaaadd6bbdfdc842f1687b9c9c4500a2afb44f231c807bbcb501f8ee1)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'buttonfactoryserv-paypal' @ 3.10.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
